Hi Christoph,


If you mean seeing the beam that results from scattered light, then
you'll need to use the mist material.  Check out Section 8.4.2 (p
457) in RwR.  I recall seeing somewhere that the mist material is
also implemented in pmap.

Cheers,

-John
